data.description: An EssentialSSL certificate from Comodo is an affordable solution for securing your lite website or intranet. No hassle with paperworks, as the issuance is based on realtime domain checks.
data.name: EssentialSSL

maintenance.title: Indicates if Openprovider API is on maintenance

results.description: An EssentialSSL certificate from Comodo is an affordable solution for securing your lite website or intranet. No hassle with paperworks, as the issuance is based on realtime domain checks.
results.name: EssentialSSL

results.description: An EssentialSSL certificate from Comodo is an affordable solution for securing your lite website or intranet. No hassle with paperworks, as the issuance is based on realtime domain checks.
results.name: EssentialSSL

delivery_time.description: Average period of time between order creation and completion.

encryption.title: Indicates the encryption level of the root certificate (40/256 bits or 128/256 bits)

free_refund_period.title: The period during which cancellation of the product can be refunded

free_reissue_period.title: The period during which cancellation of the product can be refunded

included_domains_count.title: The included domains count. '-1' in a case of Wildcard product or 1,2,3 in a case of Single/Multidomain product

is_extended_validation_supported.title: Indicates if product supports Extended Validation

is_idn_supported.title: Indicates if IDN domain names are supported

is_mobile_supported.title: Indicates, if mobile devices are supported (deprecated)

is_sgc_supported.title: Indicates, if Server Gated Cryptography supported (deprecated)

is_wildcard_multidomain_supported.title: Indicates, if product supports wildcard domains

is_wildcard_supported.title: Indicates, if product supports wildcard certificates

max_period.title: Max period certificate can be issued for

number_of_domains.title: Indicates domain(s) quantity included in the regular price. Extends in a case of Multi-domain products but for an additional fee

order_module.title: Indicates module that is related to the current product (Comodo, Symantec)

prices.title: Array of price parameters and values

sub_category.title: A sub-category of the product (deprecated field)

supported_software.title: Include a list of supported platforms

warranty.title: Returns an array of warranty in USD and reseller currency

example.name: EssentialSSL

prices.title: Array of price parameters and values

extra_domain_price.title: Group of parameters indicating price for additional (extra) domains

extra_wildcard_domain_price.title: Group of parameters indicating price for additional (extra) wildcard domains
